mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD(BRDTITLE, BRDWRITER, BRDMEMO, BRDDATE) VALUES (#{brdtitle}, #{brdwriter}, #{brdmemo}, NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT BRDNO, BRDTITLE, BRDWRITER, BRDMEMO, DATE_FORMAT(BRDDATE,'%Y-%m-%d') BRDDATE, SUB.RN AS BRDRN FROM ( SELECT *, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY BRDNO) AS RN FROM BOARD ORDER BY BRDNO DESC ) SUB WHERE SUB.RN BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
